    Research

    Published Articles

    Measuring Social and Externality Benefits of Influenza Vaccination, Journal of Human Resources, July 2021.

    Press: LA Times, NPR (Markletplace), Tradeoffs Podcast, IFLScience, Reddit (front page), Marginal Revolution University, , White House Report

    Population Mortality and Laws Encouraging Influenza Vaccination for Hospital Workers (joint with Mariana Carrera and Emily Lawler), Annals of Internal Medicine, January 2021.

    Please email me for an ungated version.
    Press: See for summary

    Can Access to Health Care Mitigate the Effects of Temperature on Mortality? (joint with Jamie Mullins), Journal of Public Economics, November 2020.

    IZA Discussion Paper No. 12717
    Previously Circulated as “Does Access to Health Care Mitigate Environmental Damages?”

    Temperature and Mental Health: Evidence from the Spectrum of Mental Health Outcomes (joint with Jamie Mullins), Journal of Health Economics, December 2019.

    Press: Yahoo News, The Conversation, Men’s Health

    The Impacts of Reduced Access to Abortion and Family Planning Services on Abortions, Births, and Contraceptive Purchases (joint with Heather Royer and Stefanie Fischer), Journal of Public Economics, November 2018.

    NBER Working Paper No. 23634, IZA Discussion Paper No. 10920
    Media Coverage: NYT The Upshot, New York Times, Marginal Revolution, Houston Chronicle, MarketWatch
    Amicus Brief Coverage: Washington Post, New York Times, Brookings Report, Nature, C-SPAN

    Can Paid Sick Leave Mandates Reduce Leave-Taking? (joint with Jenna Stearns), Labour Economics, April 2018.

    Press: Popular Science

    The Dynamic Relationship Between Temperature and Morbidity, Journal of the Association of Environmental and Resource Economists, December 2017.

    Using vehicle-to-grid technology for frequency regulation and peak-load reduction (joint with K. Max Zhang), Journal of Power Sources, April 2011.

    Working Papers

    Health Care Centralization: The Health Impacts of Obstetric Unit Closures in the US (joint with Heather Royer and Stefanie Fischer)
